content:
I used to include images for my pages using ImplementationGuide.Binary
but the new ImplementationGuide does not have that. How are people adding images to the IG?
in the pages/assets folder using ig.json file to tell the IG-pub
thx. This means that the ImplementationGuide resource does not have much control over which images to include, right?
depends how you preprocess you source files. Lloyds way does, mine does not. (ig.xml is pretty useless - my way,,, but that is about to change soon0
My approach relies on folders, not explicit referencing by the IG
Ok so the logic falls on the template (where to find are the images).
Then it sems ImplementationGuide.binary is not needed.
It's never actually done anything for as long as I can remember
